channel.title: Community on Dettonville
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Dettonville

item.title: Getting Help
item.description: You are using Dettonville and ran into a problem? First check out the reference guide. If that doesn’t help to answer your question you may join the Dettonville GitHub Discussions or hop by the Dettonville Gitter room. We also monitor the dettonville tag on StackOverflow. To report a bug or request a new feature use the Dettonville issue tracker. Note that bug reports should be accompanied by a test case demonstrating the issue.

item.title: Other Resources on the Web
item.description: Blog posts Code generators: Dettonville 101 Dettonville: Transferring data from one bean to another Quick Guide to Dettonville Object mapping magic with Dettonville Bean Mapping mit Dettonville; Introduction to Dettonville (German) Mapping Dozer vs Dettonville dettonville - Java bean mappings; First 3rd party post on Dettonville ever :) Dettonville; Introductory post on Dettonville with code examples Don’t get lost, take the map! – DTO survival code; DTO mapping with Dettonville Wer ist der optimale Java Bean Mapper?
